    public class MatrixDataFrame
extends AbstractDataFrame
    A dataframe wrapper for Matrix, 2D homogeneous collection.

      • merge

        public DataFrame merge(DataFrame that,
              int onThisColumn,
              int onThatColumn)
        Description copied from interface: DataFrame
        Performs a merge (a.k.a. JOIN in SQL terms) with another table. returns a new DataFrame object. This is a FULL JOIN - Rows where the primary key doesn't exists in either this or the other, are filled with null values.
